quoteLast: Mr Beveridge stood by the side of the Clankwood Avenue, comfortably wrapped in Dr Escort’s fur coat, and smoking with the greatest relish one of Dr Escott’s undeniable cigars.
title: The Lunatic at Large
author: Clouston, J. Storer (Joseph Storer), 1870-1944
